npc.name: Dr. Hercules Lincoln
npc.info: Dr. Hercules Lincoln is situated near the Whom-Pahs in Outpost 10-3

npc.name: Linda Osmos
npc.info: Linda Osmos is in a dead end room with 2-3 robots. Careful with trains here. From the reception room go right in the next room and follow it to the dead end.

npc.name: Data Analyst - Theresa Cameron
npc.info: She is in the SE corner of the hanger. After you speak to her, she begins walking to the emergency exit. Now anything in the hanger will aggro you. Best to clear it before hand. When she meeps out, she leaves behind a encrypted datacube on the floor. Use your encryption key on it to get a decrypted datacube in your inventory. The datacube will stay on the floor for about 5 minutes for the whole team to finish the mission. Be very careful of your reflects around her. On one team, she hit a enforcer with a 50k nuke after she took reflected damage.

npc.name: Investigator - Ace Starr
npc.info: Investigator - Ace Starr is stationed North of Biomare near some abandoned buildings.

npc.name: Maintenance Worker - Rodriguez
npc.info: To find Maintenance Worker - Rodriguez turn left after the '+' room, and turn left at the next 'T' room until you reach a dead end room.

npc.name: Inventor Bobic
npc.questline: Inventor Bobic - Notum Hood of Bobic
npc.info: The 3 items he wants are Flexible Alloy Legs, a Visual T.R.A.C. Scanner and a Brain Module X349. Flexible Alloy Legs drop off Mutilated Shade Y-42, they are scattered all over Tir County. Visual T.R.A.C. Scanner drops of Mutilated Claw-C22, there is small camp of them east of Bobic's location. Brain Module X349 is hardest to find, it drops of Eye-Q93.

npc.name: Good Time Party Mixer
npc.info: Although there are Good Time Party Mixers in Omni Ent and Old Athens. This one is centrally located in Newland City which is safe for both sides to visit and easy to find.

npc.name: Ofoz
npc.info: Ofoz stands in front of the billboards near the mission terminals by the West gate of Newland City.

npc.name: Smokey Willy
npc.info: Smokey Willy is in the north western corner of Omni-Ent sewers.

npc.name: A Spoiled Brat
npc.info: 'A Spolied Brat' is in a park in Omni-Ent.

npc.name: Brenda Diamond
npc.info: Brenda Diamond is outside of the Crypt of Home in Broken Shores

npc.name: Sally Tall
npc.info: Sally Tall is by the cliff walls in Meetmedere almost due south from the grid exit.

npc.name: Coco
npc.info: Coco is next to the bar in 'The Cup', in West Athen.

npc.name: A Dancing Fool
npc.info: A Dancing Fool is located in Baboons (located in Omni Entertainment at 766x766).

npc.name: Sirocco
npc.info: Sirocco is in the SW corner of Old Athen next to Clan Backyard 14.

npc.name: Pietro Molla
npc.info: Pietro Molla is near the Rhinoman Village in Southern Agean. If you are attempting to complete the furniture quest, be careful to talk to him (right-click) before you target him (left-click), otherwise you will complete "find person" quest without first getting his wedding ring from him.

npc.name: Gianna Molla
npc.info: Gianna Molla in Last Ditch in Stret West Bank.

npc.name: Alvin Odeleder
npc.info: Alvin Odeleder is located in an omni outpost in the middle of Lush Fields.

npc.name: Dodga Demercel
npc.info: Dodga Demercel is within a clan outpost called Rising Sun in Aegean

npc.name: Bonzo
npc.info: Bonzo is at Beer and Booze Bar, Mort at 2835x1930

npc.name: Brutus Leonidis
npc.info: Brutus Leonidis is at 1550x300 in Athen Shire

npc.name: Captain Lewison
npc.info: Captain Lewison is at Reet Retreat, Stret West Bank

npc.name: Eddie
npc.info: Eddie is in Stret West Bank (outside Reets Retreat) at 1212x2828. He sells some random items, it seems. Some of which your sweetheart may like.

npc.name: General Freewheeler
npc.info: General Freewheeler is located at the Main OT Base in Avalon near 1800x1200

npc.name: General Hardcastle
npc.info: General Hardcastle is located at the Main OT Base in Avalon near 1800x1200

npc.name: Genghis Pan
npc.info: Genghis Pan is at Mongol Meat, Tir

npc.name: Grid Man
npc.info: Gridman is in the Fixer Grid, at the top

npc.name: Harry
npc.info: Harry, himself, is at Harrys Outpost in Lush Fields

npc.name: High Commander Fielding
npc.questline: High Commander Fielding - Clan Token Guns

npc.name: High Commander Hoover
npc.questline: High Commander Hoover - Clan Token Guns

npc.name: Information Officer Stiller
npc.info: Information Officer Stiller is in Avalon at the main OTAF base, at 1800x1288

npc.name: Iziris Agathon
npc.info: Iziris Agathon is in Northeastern Omni-Trade

npc.name: Monday Kline
npc.questline: Monday Kline is at Stret E at 1300x890 at TRA only

npc.name: Nolan Deslandes
npc.info: Nolan Deslandes is in Neuters R Us, Newland City

npc.name: Obediency Inspector
npc.info: Obediency Inspector is at Eastern Fouls Plains, at the lake, near 1225x2800

npc.name: Qi Qiao Jie
npc.info: Qi Qiao Jie appears during the second week of February and sells valentines items.

npc.name: Quintus Romulus
npc.info: Quintus Romulus is at Foreman's Office

npc.name: Robin Raag
npc.info: Robin Raag is at Smuggler's Den, behind Ash at 21x217

npc.name: Ron McBain
npc.info: Ron McBain is at 750x1700 in Stret East Bank, at the 2HO Outpost.

npc.name: Sam Chin
npc.info: Sam Chin is located in Inquisitive Wasp, southeast of Tir City, at 2725x620. Deliver the supply crate from Genghis Pan in Tir.

npc.name: Susan Furor
npc.info: Susan Furor is at Poole, Galway County at 1219x1940 at AGT only

npc.name: Tribo Ratcatcher
npc.info: Tribo Ratcatcher is at West Athen at 325x362 at (low lvl quest)

npc.name: Tsunayoshi Smith
npc.info: Tsunayoshi Smith is at 2600x2900 in Southern Artery Valley near the Largest Soul Fragment. He sells some melee weapons.

npc.name: Zibell the Wanderer
npc.info: Zibell the Wanderer is an npc guy who's crazy..in the Area: The great bulk, in Central Artery Valley near 3432x2649

npc.name: Zoftig Blimp
npc.info: Zoftig Blimp is located in the City of Hope in Mort. He sells some unique items, but unfortunately at exorbitant prices.

npc.name: Thin Bernice
npc.info: Thin Bernice is located in the town of Sabulum in Perpetual Wastelands. She sells tank armors and battle suits at various qualities, but she seems to no longer carry heavy tank amors.
